description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger, per Mach and Ormsby. Physical description: 15-18 lines per page; written in casual naskh in black on blue glazed, laid European paper. Handwriting switches to nastaʻliq with elements of shikastah on leaf 209a. Catchwords; marginal notes. Rubrication on leaves 1b-7a. Marginal insect damage and mild staining. Origin: Original text completed Jumādá II 1204 H [February-March 1790]; this copy, likely first half of the 19th century, by Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn Abū [!] Dharr al-Māzandarānī (leaf 269b). Incipit: الحمد لله ... کتاب النکاح و هو لغة الوطى على الاشهر و شرعا العقد اجماعا
author: Ṭabāṭabāʼī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, 1748-approximately 1816
abstract: Second half of a commentary on al-Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī's Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ; contains Kitāb al-nikāḥ to the end.
extent: 270 leaves : paper ; 217 x 171 (156 x 118) mm bound to 219 x 171 mm
uniform_title: Sharḥ al-ṣaghīr ʻalá al-Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ. Jild 2
شرح الصغير على المختصر النافع. جلد 2
creator: Ṭabāṭabāʼī, ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad, 1748-approximately 1816
طباطبائي، علي بن محمد، 1748-approximately 1816
subject: Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī, Jaʻfar ibn al-Ḥasan, 1205 or 1206-1277—Mukhtaṣar al-nāfiʻ.
binding_note: Full brown leather with gold-painted fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
